div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 632 Celeiu (formerly Sucidava), c. 34 km. W of Turnu Magurele, Rumania, 1915 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: 16 AR Maroneia: 1 spread-flan tetradr. Thasos: 15 spread-flan tetradr. incl. imit. Disposition: G. Severeanu, Bucharest Moisil, Balcania 1944, pp. 12-3
